titleInfo.title: Mahometis Abdallae filii theologia dialogo explicata

mods.abstract: Summary of the twelfth-century Latin Quran translation
mods.note: in 1543 Petreius printed "De revolutionibus orbium coelestium libri VI" by Nicolaus Copernicus
For whole item from which this image was taken: no binding.
